attributes.action: Lower the cost of British Citizenship applications
attributes.additional_details: There are people who lived and worked in this country most of their lives, paid tax,s both to the central goverment and local goverment. have brought up their family here  and have been a benifit to the country. But when they descide to take British citzenship there are being asked to pay an exstortionate fee. They should not have to go through a process that newer arrival have to go through and as such not have to pay this extortionate fee.
attributes.background:
Reduce fee level for long established residents
 Have a number of  fee,s levels dependent on circumstances or reduce to fee to a sensible level and not use cost benifits not use ironious reasons for the level of cost.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564011

If you want fees to be changed in a different way to the above petition, you could start a new petition setting out clearly how you want fees to be changed.
